matrxs.objects.simple_objects¶

Module Contents¶

class SquareBlock(location, name='Block')¶

Bases: matrxs.objects.env_object.EnvObject

class Door(location, is_open, name='Door', open_colour='#006400', closed_colour='#640000')¶

Bases: matrxs.objects.env_object.EnvObject

open_door(self)¶

Opens the door, changes the colour and sets the properties as such.

close_door(self)¶

Closes the door, changes the colour and sets the properties as such.
